item.title: How to setup a free SSL certificate for use with Serverless APIs
item.description: If you’re reading this blog it will become very obvious I’m a big fan of the Serverless framework to power AWS Lambda and API Gateway integration. When building real APIs that you’d like to deploy publicly one thing you’ll run into eventually is that of setting up a custom domain name. API Gateway is fantastic and you can get up and running in a hurry, exposing a publicly facing API running over SSL.
